sqlMap.sql:
SELECT T.*,F.* FROM ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_BANNER_DATA T, ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA F
ORDER BY T.BANNER_ID
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.BANNER_ID, T.BANNER_NAME, T.BANNER_ORDE, T.BANNER_LVL,
T.FILE_ID, F.FILE_TYPE, F.FILE_ADDR AS FILE_URL,
T.BANNER_PIC AS IMG_ID, P.FILE_ADDR AS IMG_URL
FROM ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_BANNER_DATA T LEFT JOIN ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA P ON T.BANNER_PIC=P.FILE_ID LEFT JOIN ${schema.interPlat}.MZJ_FILES_DATA F ON T.FILE_ID=F.FILE_ID
T.STATUS='1'
T.DEL_FLAG='0'
TO_CHAR(T.VAILD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >=TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY T.BANNER_ID
